thread.title: 10 software engineering jobs to watch this week
thread.title_full: 10 software engineering jobs to watch this week

author: Elvina Taher
title: 10 software engineering jobs to watch this week
text: Looking for opportunities in software engineering? We have handpicked 10 jobs for you this week. Click on the links below and apply away! Recruiting and keen to list your jobs in future articles? Click here to create your company profile and post jobs. We feature jobs based on the following criteria: Activity of recruiters on the platform. Recruiters who actively post new jobs, remove old ones, and accept/reject applicants will have higher chances of being featured. Completeness of company profile and job details. Company with incomplete profile or poor job description will not be featured. Data Engineer at Tech in Asia Tech in Asia (YC W15) is a media, events, and jobs platform on a mission to build and serve Asia’s tech communities. Work location: Singapore / Full-time Requirement: Minimum 2 years of experience analytics and data science, ability to work independently to solve problems and develop solutions, experience with natural language processing. Skills: Python, data science, SQL. Salary Range: SGD 4,500 – 5,500 Equity: Yes More jobs at Tech in Asia Front End Developer at Sejasa.com Sejasa is Indonesia’s leading service marketplace. Sejasa is on a mission to transform the way people look for services. Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia / Full-time Requirement: Passion for creating great user experiences on multiple devices, a solid understanding of HTML, CSS/SASS, and responsive development, ability to work well with others. Skills: Software engineering, UI/UX design. Salary Range: IDR 5,000,000 – 9,000,000 More jobs at Sejasa.com Full Stack Web Engineer at Weavedin Weavedin is state of art of cloud based mobile first Retail software that will bring all the benefits of Omnichannel retail to Brick and Mortar stores. Work location: Bangalore, India / Full-time Requirement: Should be able to write good testable code, strong understanding of OOP principles, should be able to add new/breaking features with a minimum turnaround. Skills: Django, MySQL, OOP Salary Range: INR 60,000 – 125,000 More jobs at Weavedin Linux Software Engineer at DataGlen We address the key challenge of collecting, curating, managing, and processing massive amounts of spatiotemporal data generated by IoT devices. Work location: Bangalore, India / Full-time Requirement: Solid knowledge of Linux application development tools, experience installing and configuring a major Linux distribution such as RedHat or Debian. Skills: Git, Linux, Python. More jobs at DataGlen [iOS Developer at TotalStudio](https://www.techinasia.com/jobs/7264c4a8-0dca-4b68-a7b6-eb57f09c4980″>
